what: Function asocindex.It generates a data frame with the information required to calculate association indices, with the number of recruits observed under each canopy species and in the open for multiple study site. The function removes recruit species with a single individual — asocindex

Canopy_all data frame must include least three columns named: "Study_site","Canopy","Canopy_cover", last % cover canopy species (Open) study site. can obtained extracting second element list generated function plot_to_com. adjlist list community matrix recruit canopy species rows columns respectively study site. can obtained extracting third element list generated function plot_to_com.
